definitions.definition: The popular name of any of the plants in the Tropaeolum genus of flowering plants native to south and central America .
A plant in this genus, garden nasturtium ( Tropaeolum majus ).
Any of the plants in the genus Nasturtium that includes watercress .

main_definition: The popular name of any of the plants in the Tropaeolum genus of flowering plants native to south and central America .
secondary_definitions: A plant in this genus, garden nasturtium ( Tropaeolum majus ).
Any of the plants in the genus Nasturtium that includes watercress .
